ygData.subject: Re: Interesting comment about charisma
ygData.msgSnippet: My shaman friend cast Spirit of Snake on me, bumping my CHA from 85 to 100, and I was able to buy a well balanced rapier for 233 plat when it would have cost
ygData.messageBody:
My shaman friend cast Spirit of Snake on me, bumping my CHA from 85 to 100,
and I was able to buy a well balanced rapier for 233 plat when it would have
cost me 248 without.

In Beta I did the same thing. I think I dropped 5 into strength and the
rest into charisma. For final I put the same in strength and dumped the rest
into dexterity. I feel that it has been way easier for me in final but I
can't say if it is because of the difference in stats or the fact that I
knew more about how things work in final.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 2:39 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Interesting comment about charisma


From: John Kim <kim@...>

On Wed, 19 May 1999, Scott Pickle wrote:
>
> Not true, shamans have some very nice Charisma buffs starting at level 14.

Has anyone had similar results with charisma buffs though? I
plan on bugging my shaman and enchanter friends some time this
week to test it. Maybe it wasn't such a silly decision to max
my charisma with bonus points so I could RP the charming bard.
:-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
